data.eml:eml: Five new species in the genus Leschenaultia Robineau-Desvoidy, 1830 (Diptera: Tachinidae) from Mato Grosso, Mato Grosso do Sul and Rondônia, Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Toma, Ronaldo (2019): Five new species in the genus Leschenaultia Robineau-Desvoidy, 1830 (Diptera: Tachinidae) from Mato Grosso, Mato Grosso do Sul and Rondônia, Brazil. Zootaxa 4577 (1): 103-116, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4577.1.6
